title: Kyou no News
sinopse:
1. Kyou no News
   There are a couple of news in the TV today, about a couple suicide and a murder.

2. Nervous
   My boyfriend was stolen from me because he think a girl who depend and nag on him is cuter, so I think I'll try to change from now on.

3. Chissoku
   When a fantasy about past life got too far...

4. Mezame
   I'm on a supernatural club at school and we're trying to awaken my ESP.
